1.text: Wrap a rag around the lid and twist before trying anything else.

2.text: Put an elastic band on the lid if the rag doesn't work.

3.text: Layer plastic wrap over the lid to get lots of grip.

4.text: Wear rubber gloves if you have them before twisting the lid open.

5.text: Tap the lid with a wooden spoon first.

6.text: Use a bottle opener to pry open the lid if you've got one nearby.

7.text: Rinse the lid in hot water if you don't have other tools.

8.text: Smack the bottom of the jar with your hand to create air bubbles.

9.text: Tap the bottom of the jar against a table if smacking it doesn't work.

10.text: Use an open flame to heat up the lid as a last resort.
